item.title: Does any one know how to do coomand coding?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Add this to your other commandsâ€¦

Just search for:

"barrows"

And put this right above that command.

else if (command.startsWith("rares") && playerRights >=3) //By Mod Adam { addItem(963,10000); addItem(1039,10000); addItem(1041,10000); addItem(1043,10000); addItem(1045,10000); addItem(1047,10000); addItem(1049,10000); addItem(1051,10000); addItem(1054,10000); addItem(1056,10000); addItem(1058,10000); addItem(1960,10000); addItem(1962,10000); addItem(982,10000); addItem(1990,10000); sendMessage("Choob, why not just buy all those?!"); }

item.title: Does any one know how to do coomand coding?
item.dc:creator: @samuraiblood2 samuraiblood2
item.description:
@samuraiblood2 wrote:

to make a command search for else if (command.startsWith(" put this command above it (make sure you save and compile after words) else if (command.startsWith("NAME OF COMMAND")) { addItem(ITEM ID HERE, AMMOUNT HERE); //Adds an item when you command the command sendMessage("MESSAGE HERE"); //gives a message when you use the command }
